verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father we love You,
We worship and adore You
Glorify Your Name in all the earth,
Glorify Your Name, Glorify Your Name.
Glorify Your Name in all the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus we love you…
We worship and adore You
Glorify Your Name in all the earth,
Glorify Your Name, Glorify Your Name.
Glorify Your Name in all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit we love you…
We worship and adore You
Glorify Your Name in all the earth,
Glorify Your Name, Glorify Your Name.
Glorify Your Name in all the earth.
